All Implemented Interfaces:
GetMotdService, RemoteService, SerializationPolicyProvider, Serializable, javax.servlet.Servlet, javax.servlet.ServletConfig
public class GetMotdServiceImpl
extends OdeRemoteServiceServlet
implements GetMotdService

Implementation of the get motd service.

Note that this service must be state-less so that it can be run on multiple servers.

Author:
kerr@google.com (Debby Wallach)

getCheckInterval

public int getCheckInterval()
Returns the value, in seconds, of the motd.check.interval.secs flag. 0 means don't check motd.

Specified by:
getCheckInterval in interface GetMotdService
Returns:
the interval to use, in seconds, between motd update checks
